description: Creates a new stock entry (Entree) with multiple associated articles and links it to a supplier, manufacturer, and account.

fournisseurId.description: The unique code of the supplier

fabriquantId.description: The unique code of the manufacturer

compteId.description: The ID of the account (Responsable Chantier) responsible for this entry

observation.description: Optional notes or observations about the entry

items.description: A JSON stringified array of article items

bande_commande.description: PDF or image of the purchase order

bande_livraison.description: PDF or image of the delivery note

400.description: Missing required fields or invalid data

404.description: Supplier, Manufacturer, or Account not found
